definition: appearance/portrait/picture/government minister/(physics) phase/(literary) to appraise (esp. by scrutinizing physical features)/to read sb's fortune (by physiognomy, palmistry etc)
each other/one another/mutually/fret on the neck of a pipa 琵琶[pi2 pa5] (a fret on the soundboard is called a 品[pin3])
right/correct/couple/pair/towards/at/for/to face/opposite/to treat (sb a certain way)/to match together/to adjust/to fit/to suit/to answer/to reply/classifier: couple
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: This method can be easily generalized to relativistically phenomenological dynamical equation.
sentences.chinese: 這一方法易於推廣到相對論性唯象動力學方程。

sentences.english: The relativistic classical scattering angular distributions are predicted which may be compared with experiments.
sentences.chinese: 相對論性經典理論預言的角分佈可與實驗比較。

sentences.english: The conservation laws of relativistic variable mass systems were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究相對論性變質量系統的守恆律。

sentences.english: The quantization of vortices has also been discussed in the relativistic superfluid in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 另外還討論了相對論性超流體中的渦旋量子化。
